Title: Jewel Link Chronicles: Legend of Athena
Description: Jewel Link Chronicles: Legend of Athena is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Avanquest Software,which was released in Europe in 2011.

Title: Jewel Link Chronicles: Mountains of Madness
Description: Play the latest Jewel Link adventure! Atop a snowy mountain you find yourself alone, facing the dangers that lie ahead. Explore mystifying realms as you navigate across a strange wilderness that surprises you with secrets around every corner. Unlock new tools and power-ups as you advance through a multitude of puzzles, working to decipher the mystery of the Mountains of Madness!

Title: Jewel Link Chronicles: Mountains of Madness
Description: Play the latest Jewel Link adventure! Atop a snowy mountain you find yourself alone, facing the dangers that lie ahead. Explore mystifying realms as you navigate across a strange wilderness that surprises you with secrets around every corner. Unlock new tools and power-ups as you advance through a multitude of puzzles, working to decipher the mystery of the Mountains of Madness!

Title: Jewel Link: Arctic Quest
Description: Jewel Link: Arctic Quest is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Avanquest Software,which was released in Europe in 2013.

Title: Jewel Link: Atlantic Quest
Description: Jewel Link: Atlantic Quest is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Avanquest Software,which was released in Europe in 2012.

Title: Jewel Link: Galactic Quest
Description: Jewel Link: Galactic Quest is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Avanquest Software,which was released in Europe in 2012.

Title: Jewel Link: Legends of Atlantis
Description: Atlantis - Did it ever really exist?For a milennia, adventurers have sought the sunken kingdom and its countless treasures - but who created the mystic city in the first place?Discover the secret, create magnificent buildings and restore Atlantis to its former glory. Collect ancient artefacts and secret treasures to help you along the way. Test your Jewel-matching skills over a series of challenging levels, in this captivating, underwater puzzle game!- 100 challenging levels and two game modes - All in 3D!- Construct 20 monumental buildings- Collect trophies- Match-3 adventure with completely new features

Title: Jewel Link: Safari Quest
Description: Jewel Link: Safari Quest is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Avanquest Software,which was released in Europe in 2013.

Title: Jewel Master Collection
Description: Follow the tracks of Hercules, Pyramids and the Sphinx, to the cradle of civilization! Construct the Pergamon Alter, the famous Theater of Dionysus and countless other legendary buildings!In this one of a kind Match 3 Adventure, swap adjacent tiles so that rows of three or more of the same symbols emerge. By doing this, you will collect food, building resources, jewels and gold, as well as magical artifacts for your mission.

Title: Jewel Master: Cradle of Athena
Description: In this one of a kind Match 3 Adventure, swap adjacent tiles so that rows of three or more of the same symbols emerge. By doing this, you will collect food, building resources, jewels and gold, as well as magical artifacts for your mission. Will the Goddess of Wisdom be merciful to you?

Title: Jewel Master: Egypt
Description: Welcome to the country of the Pyramids and the Sphinx, the cradle of civilization! Match 3 sources of wood, gold and more to create Egypt. Proceed on a time trip back to the origins of old Egypt, and witness the origin of one of the most fascinating cultures in the history of Humanity!

Title: Jewel Master: Cradle of Egypt 2
Description: Cradle of Egypt 2 allows players to journey through 100 levels of challenging match-three fun, all while recreating the millennia-old civilization of Ancient Egypt. Players advance from hard-working farmers to Pharaohs, building the Pyramids, Sphinx and 18 other famous monuments. As part of the best-selling Jewel Master series, Cradle of Egypt 2 builds on the previous games' formula that has made the series a phenomenal success.

Title: Jewel Master: Cradle of Persia
Description: Journey through 100 levels of challenging match-three fun and enjoy the exhilarating process of rebuilding the great Persian Empire. A part of the Jewel Master series, Cradle of Persia lets players combine three or more tiles to obtain all the gold and materials required to transform a desert settlement into one of the greatest empires in history.

Title: Cradle of Rome
Description: In Cradle of Rome, players can build more than 20 historical sites from 5 different eras of Ancient Roman architecture by gathering resources such as wood, tools, gold and more by matching rows of 3 or more on the puzzle board and obtaining as many as possible before the time runs out.The more resources players gather, the faster they can build the city from a lowly saw mill and progress to such historical monuments such as the Temple of Venus and eventually the mighty Coliseum.Multiple gameplay modes offer various degrees of difficulty and a vast array of bonus tools adds even more incentive to continue the game and eventually become Emperor.

Title: Jewel Master: Cradle of Rome 2
Description: This addictive match-three title focuses on players rebuilding one of the greatest civilizations known to man, Rome. From the humble farmstead to the spectacular Colosseum, players must gather enough gold and materials to return Rome to its former glory and ascend to the position of Caesar.

Title: Jewel Master: Egypt
Description: Welcome to the country of the Pyramids and the Sphinx, the cradle of civilization! Match 3 sources of wood, gold and more to create Egypt. Proceed on a time trip back to the origins of old Egypt, and witness the origin of one of the most fascinating cultures in the history of Humanity!

Title: Jewel Match
Description: Jewel Match challenges you with 150 smart levels! Create rows of three identical diamonds quickly and cunningly to burst them on both screens. All gold tiles disappear until the level has been won. Powerfully break out extras, use the hammer for difficult situations to smash the diamonds or create a magic storm by puffing into the microphone!

Title: Jewel Match 2
Description: Jewel Match 2 is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Joindots and published by Easy Interactive,which was released in Europe in 2012.

Title: Jewel Match 3
Description: Rebuild the five castles of Nevernear in this amazing Match 3 adventure. Match dazzling gems across 100 inventive levels in search of keys, potions, and more. Use portals, call on wizards, learn spells, and plant magical gardens to ward off evil. Play fantastic Hidden Object and Puzzle mini-games throughout the journey. Enjoy a beautiful soundtrack along with bonus Wallpapers.- 100 Inventive levels in search of keys, potions, and more.- Use portals, call on wizards, learn spells, and plant magical gardens to ward off evil.

Title: Jewel Pet DS 4
Description: Jewel Pet DS 4 is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by MTO,which was cancelled before it was released.

Title: Jewel Pet: Kawaii Mahou no Fantasy
Description: Jewel Pet: Kawaii Mahou no Fantasy is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by MTO,which was released in Japan in 2009.

Title: Jewel Pet: Mahou no DS Kirapi Kariin
Description: Jewel Pet: Mahou no DS Kirapi Kariin is a Simulation game, developed and published by MTO,which was released in Japan in 2009.

Title: Jewel Pet: Mahou no Oheyya de Issho ni Asobou!
Description: Jewel Pet: Mahou no Oheyya de Issho ni Asobou! is an Action game, developed and published by MTO,which was released in Japan in 2010.

Title: Jewel Quest IV: Heritage
Description: Solve over 175 Jewel Quest Heritage boards and one puzzling family mystery on a topsy-turvy quest through Europe's ancient hot spots. Hit the trail with Rupert on a journey through the shrines and castles of Hernan Cortes' lore. Swap jewels and collect puzzle pieces to unravel a perplexing web of Jewel Quest family secrets. With over 175 new Jewel Quest Heritage boards, including 3 jewel-swapping modes, new surprises await in every level.

Title: Jewel Quest Mysteries
Description: Contains both Jewel Quest Mysteries and Mysteryville - 2 great hidden objects games in 1! In Jewel Quest Mysteries, follow Rupert and Emmas efforts to reassemble the original set of Jewel Board jewels. Each game will set the player on a world-hopping adventure, uncovering the story of each jewels place in history along the way. Mysteryville tells the story of the town of Mysteryville facing a baffling occurrence: cats are disappearing in the quiet town. As an ace reporter for Countryside Life Magazine, its up to you to find the truth. Visit the shops, question the residents and examine every detail to find the answers behind this feline mystery!

Title: Jewel Quest Mysteries 2: Trail of the Midnight Heart
Description: Jewel Quest Mysteries 2: Trail of the Midnight Heart is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Licensed 4U,which was released in Europe in 2011.

Title: Jewel Quest Mysteries 3: The Seventh Gate
Description: Venture through the hidden relics of Greece as you join Emma in search of her husband and daughter whose disappearance has catapulted them into the middle of a thought-provoking mystery. They began their journey to uncover the mysteries of the famed jewel boards of ancient Greece. Emma must find her missing family before the impending volcanic eruption that will put all of their lives in peril. Don't miss out on this exciting and dangerous adventure that is unlike any other!16 unique hidden object locations38 unique sets of items to find7 jewel boards5 scrolling hidden object screens6 mini puzzlesEngrossing adventure story

Title: Jewel Quest Mysteries: Curse of the Emerald Tear
Description: Welcome to another sequel in the popular Jewel Quest puzzle game series. In Jewel Quest Mysteries, Rupert and Emma are plunged into the land of ancient intrigue, Egypt. Seek out treasures and jewels, hidden within stunning gardens and relic-laden palaces. Swap jewels to turn tiles gold in classic Jewel Quest boards, and decipher puzzles of logic and wit. Immerse yourself in this hidden object game shrouded in the lore of Jewel Quest and the mystique of ancient Egypt. It's challenging, fun, and addictive.

Title: Jewel Quest Solitaire
Description: Jewel Quest Solitaire is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Avanquest Software and published by Global Software Publishing (GSP),which was released in Europe in 2009.

Title: Jewel Quest V: The Sleepless Star
Description: Along with Percy and a beautiful Algonquin named Yellow Feather, you will travel to exotic locations on two continents and overcome dangers at every turn, in an effort to recover the jewel.The game includes over 200 jewel board puzzles, including never-before-seen obstacle puzzles! You will progress through a beautifully illustrated and fully voice-acted story that includes collectible power-ups that enhance game strategy as well as quest options filled with your favorite classic Jewel Quest games.

Title: Jewel Quest: Expeditions
Description: The highly successful jewel matching game is here for the Nintendo DS! The popular jewel matching adventure returns in a daring journey across the seas and into the heart of Africa.

Title: Jewel Quest: Solitaire Trio
Description: Jewel Quest: Solitaire Trio is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Avanquest Software,which was released in 2011.

Title: Jewel Time Deluxe
Description: Jewel Time Deluxe is packed full of gem swapping match 3 games plus loads of new twist and turns to keep you entertained for hours! Offering new gameplay modes for increased enjoyment & longevity, Jewel Time Deluxe offers casual gamers a new match 3 experience.

Title: Jewels of the Ages
Description: Two full games in one - Jewels of Olympus and Jewels of Ancient Pharaoh's! You've conquered many puzzles before but now you must summon your greatest skills as you take on a series of epic challenges! In your quest to gather a collection of priceless ancient artifacts, countless adventures lie ahead of you. Travel with Odysseus, help conquer the city of Troy, participate in the Olympics, end the Pharaoh's ancient Curse, and more!

Title: Jewels of the Tropical Lost Island
Description: Jewels of the Tropical Lost Island is the single player "Match Three" game for Nintendo DS and DSi that blends addictive puzzle gameplay with exciting pirate adventure. Game features include: atmospheric treasure hunting in the tropical islands, four different game modes based on Match Three mechanics, 109 involving levels including duels against other sailing ships and sea monsters, beautiful graphics to recreate the exotic scenery of the Caribbean, seven kinds of bonuses to make the game easier and 16 special challenges for the most accomplished players.

Title: Jibun Detsukuru Nintendo DS Guide
Description: Jibun Detsukuru Nintendo DS Guide is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Nintendo,which was released in Japan in 2010.

Title: The Jidousha Kyoushuujo
Description: The Jidousha Kyoushuujo is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Vingt-et-un Systems and published by D3Publisher,which was released in Japan in 2007.

Title: Jig-a-Pix Love Is...
Description: Jig-a-Pix Love Is... is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Frame Studios Interactive and published by Zushi Games Ltd,which was released in Europe in 2010.

Title: Jig-a-Pix Pets
Description: 80 amazing images of Cats, Dogs, Rabbits, Horses, Ponies, Fish, Small Animals, Birds & Exotic Pets.

Title: Jig-a-Pix Wild World
Description: The world is a wild place! In JIGAPIX WILD WORLD you'll find 80 amazing images of the wildest animals, from the bottom of the oceans, across vast plains, to the deepest tropical jungles; including Apes, Big Cats, Reptiles, Birds, Insects, Sea Life and more!

Title: Jig-a-Pix Wonderful World
Description: In Jigapix: Wonderful World jigsaw puzzle fans take on the addictive challenge of solving 80 landscape puzzles created from picturesque and iconic images sampled from around the world. Puzzles images included in the game come from eight different regions, as well as eight different sizes, making piecing images together more and more challenging as familiarity with regions fade and the dimensions of puzzles change. Players can solve the puzzles alone or with a friend via a wireless connection, and for those needing an occasional break from jigsaw play, there are three additional mini-games included in the game. Finally, DSi owners can take the game to a whole new level as they are able to snap photos and create their own personalized jigsaw puzzles out of the imported images.

Title: Jigoku Shoujo: Akekazura
Description: Jigoku Shoujo: Akekazura is an Adventure game, developed and published by Compile Heart,which was released in Japan in 2007.

Title: Jigsaw Puzzle
Description: Jigsaw Puzzle is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Nintendo,which was cancelled before it was released.

Title: Jigsaw Puzzle DS: DS de Meguru Sekai Isan no Tabi
Description: Jigsaw Puzzle DS: DS de Meguru Sekai Isan no Tabi is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Hudson,which was released in Japan in 2008.

Title: Jigsaw World: Daigekitou! Jig-Battle Heroes
Description: Jigsaw World: Daigekitou! Jig-Battle Heroes is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Nippon Ichi Software,which was released in Japan in 2008.

Title: Jillian Michaels Fitness Ultimatum 2010
Description: Star fitness trainer Jillian Michaels makes her debut on Nintendo DS in a portable, high-intensity workout in Jillian Michaels Pocket Trainer 2010. Choose from pre-defined routines or create your own custom workout as you follow a 3D avatar of Jillian on the way to reaching your fitness goals! Jillians tough love and expertise can now go wherever you go, so theres no excuse to miss a workout!

Title: Dynasty Warriors DS: Fighter's Battle
Description: It's time to team up with the legendary Dynasty Warriors and save Ancient China. With your awesome Musou attack you have the power to stop the hordes of enemy soldiers ready to strike. You won't want to miss this action for all the tea in China!

Title: Jinsei 8-Man-7000-Kai no Shokuji wo Tanoshiku suru
Description: Jinsei 8-Man-7000-Kai no Shokuji wo Tanoshiku suru is a Miscellaneous game, developed by h.a.n.d. Inc. and published by Square Enix,which was released in Japan in 2007.

Title: Jinsei 8-Man-7000-Kai no Shokuji wo Tanoshiku suru
Description: Jinsei 8-Man-7000-Kai no Shokuji wo Tanoshiku suru is a Miscellaneous game, developed by h.a.n.d. Inc. and published by Square Enix,which was released in Japan in 2007.

Title: Jinsei Game
Description: Jinsei Game is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Takara Tomy,which was released in Japan in 2009.

Title: Jinsei Game DS
Description: Jinsei Game DS is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Takara Tomy and published by ATLUS,which was released in Japan in 2006.

Title: Jinsei Game Q DS: Heisei no Dekigoto
Description: Jinsei Game Q DS: Heisei no Dekigoto is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Takara Tomy,which was released in Japan in 2007.

Title: Jinsei Game Q DS: Shouwa no Dekigoto
Description: Jinsei Game Q DS: Shouwa no Dekigoto is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Takara Tomy,which was released in Japan in 2007.

Title: Jishin DS: 72 Jikan
Description: Jishin DS: 72 Jikan is an Action game, developed and published by Iota,which was released in Japan in 2009.

Title: Jissen Pachi-Slot Hisshouhou! DS: Aladdin II Evolution
Description: Jissen Pachi-Slot Hisshouhou! DS: Aladdin II Evolution is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Sammy Studios and published by Sega,which was released in Japan in 2006.

Title: Jissen Pachi-Slot Hisshouhou! Hokuto no Ken
Description: Jissen Pachi-Slot Hisshouhou! Hokuto no Ken is a Miscellaneous game, published by Sammy Studios,which was released in Japan in 2005.

Title: Jissen Pachi-Slot Hisshouhou! Hokuto no Ken
Description: Jissen Pachi-Slot Hisshouhou! Hokuto no Ken is a Miscellaneous game, published by Sammy Studios,which was released in Japan in 2005.

Title: Jissen Pachi-Slot Hisshouhou! Hokuto no Ken SE DS
Description: Jissen Pachi-Slot Hisshouhou! Hokuto no Ken SE DS is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Sega,which was released in Japan in 2006.

Title: Joan Jade and the Gates of Xibalba
Description: Joan Jade and the Gates of Xibalba is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Alawar Entertainment, Inc and published by Easy Interactive,which was released in Europe in 2011.

Title: John Deere: Harvest in the Heartland
Description: Craft fertile soil into a profitable, prize winning and picture-worthy farm. Prepare land and livestock to produce goods with which you can profit, and earn money to purchase John Deere equipment, land, or livestock to improve your farm. Use the touch screen and stylus to Sculpt the Heartland into the farm of your dreams.

Title: Johnny Bravo: Date-O-Rama!
Description: Johnny Bravo: Date-O-Rama! is an Action game, developed by EM Studios Limited and published by Blast! Entertainment Ltd,which was released in Europe in 2009.

Title: Johnny no Dasshutsu Daisakusen
Description: Johnny no Dasshutsu Daisakusen is an Action game, developed and published by Success,which was released in Japan in 2008.

Title: Johnny Test
Description: Push the limits of reality as Johnny Test in this physics-bending Nintendo DS game based on the hit Cartoon Network show. When Johnny meddles with one of his genius twin sisters' out-of-this-world science experiments, he plunges the town of Porkbelly into chaos. Now Johnny and his loyal pooch Dukey must break all the rules in order to save his friends in this action-packed platformer adventure!

Title: Jojo's Fashion Show
Description: 20 years after her meteoric ascent and sudden disappearance from the runway, hot fashion designer Jojo Cruz is making a comeback. Can you help Jojo mix and match today's hottest fashions and prove to the world that she's still got style? Use the Nintendo DS stylus to dress models in thousands of different stylish outfits from Jojo's collection. Explore a wide variety of clothing styles ranging from Western to Bridal to Eveningwear. Race against the clock at each runway show and unlock hundreds of unique clothing items and accessories.Play 60 action puzzle levels by matching styles and finding hot signature outfits!

Title: Jonas
Description: Live out the rock star life of the JONAS band members and find out how everyday life collides with the pop star world in the new JONAS video game for Nintendo DS. Inspired by the latest hit Disney Channel Original Series, JONAS invites fans to play as band members Nick, Joe and Kevin in non-stop, hilarious adventures set in exciting TV show locations ,featuring JONAS music and friends Stella and Macy. Tear up the stage, juggle school and friends, and still make it home in time for dinner. Players must stay on their toes and steer clear of JONAS-mania in this musical adventure with their favorite superstar idols.

Title: Josefiina Alkupolku Englannin kieli - Mysteeri Lontoossa
Description: Josefiina Alkupolku Englannin kieli - Mysteeri Lontoossa is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Krea Media and published by Elaevaet Kirjat,which was released in Europe in 2009.

Title: Josefiina Alkupolku Matematiikka - Sumua Lukukylaen Yllae
Description: Josefiina Alkupolku Matematiikka - Sumua Lukukylaen Yllae is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Krea Media and published by Elaevaet Kirjat,which was released in Europe in 2009.

Title: Josefiina Alkupolku Seikkailumaa - Unelmien Peili
Description: Josefiina Alkupolku Seikkailumaa - Unelmien Peili is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Krea Media and published by Elaevaet Kirjat,which was released in Europe in 2008.

Title: K-1 World GP
Description: K-1 World GP is an Action game, published by D3Publisher,which was released in Japan in 2007.

Title: K-1 World GP

Title: Snapdots
Description: Welcome to Snapdots! Complete dozens of puzzle pictures by rotating the puzzle to find the best angle and shooting blocks from your UFO. If the placement isn't quite right, use the UFO to retrieve blocks and shoot them in different spots. Adding to the challenge, puzzles often contain several types of blocks and spots, each with its own characteristics. Journey to multiple planets to tackle puzzles individually in Puzzle mode, or try to clear as many puzzles as you can within a time limit in the frenetic Time Attack mode. In either mode, strategy and action combine to create a classic puzzle game that definitely hits the spot.

Title: Wario: Master of Disguise

The game features several playable characters along with a bonus character. Each character has her own special power, which can be used to hinder the opponent. Wireless play and a variety of rule sets bring great replay-ability to this addictive game.

(2 player versus only available on Wii version) - Earn extra Advent cards and unlock additional special abilities that could be used on multiple game modes - Simple but versatile controls allow players of all skill levels to pull off their favorite Kamen Rider moves from the show

Title: A Kappa's Trail
Description: Step into the world of a kappa, a mythical river spirit famous in Japanese folklore, as he tries to make his way to the human world. In addition to the challenging main game, you'll find three different minigames to further improve your kappa-related skills. You'll start your journey in Kappa Cove, a good place to go exploring, practice getting around and munch on a few fish. The intuitive controls are all handled with the stylus (draw a trail and the kappa will follow it), but the helpful Chumfish is more than willing to teach you the basics. Once you begin your path down the Kappa Trail, you'll encounter coins to collect, boulders to shatter and various mini-kappas that can help you in specific ways. Just be sure to avoid the Devil Hand. If you need a break, you can collect paintings or cassettes from the Chumfish Shack, count plates at a sushi restaurant or test your mettle in the treacherous Trial of Tiles. With its cute graphics and charming story, your time with the kappa will certainly be memorable. Who knows what you'll find as you make your way through A Kappa's Trail?

Title: A Kappa's Trail

In addition to the challenging main game, you'll find three different minigames to further improve your kappa-related skills. You'll start your journey in Kappa Cove, a good place to go exploring, practice getting around and munch on a few fish. The intuitive controls are all handled with the stylus (draw a trail and the kappa will follow it), but the helpful Chumfish is more than willing to teach you the basics. Title: Kenkou Kentei

Title: Dairojo! Samurai Defenders
Description: On the awakening of the Edo period, Shoguns fight ferocious battles to win over the Land of the Rising Sun. From Kumamoto to Tsuruga, six emblematic castles are under siege by implacable ninjas attacking from land and air. Strategically position your spears, archers, gunners, generals and cannons. Promote their ranks and wisely employ the smoke bombs and rice balls to your advantage. But don't get overly confident - the art of war of Hana, the Geisha, is a reminder that appearances can be deceptive. Four game-play modes include Score Attack, Normal Mode, Random Mode and Versus (via DS Download Play). The game also includes a Fast Forward function and several degrees of difficulty.

Title: Karasawa Shunichi no Zettai ni Ukeru!! Zatsugakuen DS
Description: Karasawa Shunichi no Zettai ni Ukeru!! Zatsugakuen DS is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Takara Tomy,which was released in Japan in 2007.

Title: Kariyazaki Shougo Kanshuu: Flower Arrangement DS
Description: Kariyazaki Shougo Kanshuu: Flower Arrangement DS is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by GungHo,which was cancelled before it was released.

Title: Kart Krashers
Description: Kart Krashers is a single player game where the player drives their kart through an exciting 10 stage circuit that spans the globe, and beyond! Each stage has three uniquely laid out events, for a total of 30 challenging competitions. The goal is simple: collect stars and smash into objects to achieve the highest event score. Earn enough points and you will win up to three Golden Wheels in each event, which are the key to advancing in the Kart Krashers competition. The competition starts with a team of two drivers. Emily Prix is a young girl that can fix just about anything, and who needs the Kart Krashers prize money to help her struggling family. Cross Ranson is a talented and motivated driver with attitude and a flair for danger, but is plagued by a mysterious curse that can only be broken by winning the Kart Krashers competition. Throughout the course of the circuit you will meet up with three new drivers, each with their own motivations, and each bringing new Kart capabilities and driving styles to your team. As you unlock stages more and more of the mystery of the Kart Krasher competition is revealed. Earn enough golden wheels and your team will win the grand prize, and the honor of being known as Kart Krashing champions. There are achievement medals to be won, and high scores to be set. Don't miss out on a chance to be a Kart Krashing legend.

Title: Spectrobes
Description: The Fate of the Universe is in Your Hands! Rallen and Jeena must use the power of the Spectrobes to save their galaxy from the evil Krawl. Excavate fossilized Spectrobes with your stylus, awaken them with your voice, customize and evolve them in the lab, choose your team and prepare for epic battles! Unlock rare Spectrobes and custom parts using exclusive code input cards. Trade Spectrobes and battle up to 16 friends wirelessly.

Title: Katamari Damacy
Description: Taking a break from celestial construction, the King of All Cosmos takes the royal family on vacation to a tropical island paradise, where they become tasked with the responsibility of creating new katamari islands for homeless animals. An epic undertaking of this time, earthly proportions, the King calls upon his pint-sized son, the Prince, and all of his cousins for help. New features found in Me and My Katamari include: Wireless play for up to four people on the PSP system; A cast of playable characters that includes the Prince and his cousins - a mix of familiar faces and new additions; A host of customization options for player characters, including new masks and headgear, as well as the ability to wear them on the head, face and body; A new island interface that highlights player options and the different stages represented by animals in need of new homes.
